Draw grob

draw_grob.Rd

Draw grob on device page.

draw_grob(grob, newpage = TRUE, vp = NULL)

Arguments

grob

grid object
newpage

draw on a new page
vp

a viewport object (or NULL).

Examples

library(dplyr)
library(grid)

rect <- rectGrob(width = unit(0.5, "npc"), height = unit(0.5, "npc"))
rect %>% draw_grob(vp = viewport(angle = 45))

num <- lapply(1:10, textGrob)
num %>%
  arrange_grobs(grobs = .) %>%
  draw_grob()
showViewport()
